pages.title: Globes
pages.text: Globes are trophy blocks found as a reward at the end of a dungeon. Globes offer no practical function and are instead a decoration block. They can be spun around by right-clicking or can spin forever when powered by redstone.

pages.title: Space Paintings
pages.text: Space paintings are found in chests throughout dungeons. They work exactly like regular paintings but only place paintings from this mod. There are 14 pieces to look for.
